name: Yolika
description: She's a descendant of the Earth and Water Unicorn.
skills: She can hide so well in green bushes with large leaves, that thanks to her camouflage nobody recognizes her.

name: Zato
description: He's a descendant of the Earth and Water unicorns.
skills: He can hide so well between trees and branches, that thanks to his camouflage nobody recognizes him.

name: Firo
description: The Fire Unicorn is the master of the element Fire.
skills: He can shoot a flaming ring from his horn. It can create fire and control it.

name: icey
description: The Ice Unicorn is a kind and brave Unicorn.
skills: He can use his horn to make a powerful blast of ice.

name: Rando
description: Rando is the fastest among the Unicorns
skills: His streamlined body allows him to run long distances very fast.

name: Volo
description: Volo is the unicorn of the stars.
skills: He is so good at locations is space, you will get the best ride with him and never get lost.

name: Sito
description: Sito enjoys dancing to the music, This is why he can often be found very close to the parties.
skills: He often visits his friends to show them his latest stunts

name: Sinette
description: Sinette loves to play with her friends and teach them how to jump through waterfalls.
skills: She loves to dance around her nose

name: Ono
description: Ono is the leader of all the unicorns
skills: he likes to practice astronomy and fly between galaxies.

name: Lavera
description: Because she is so fun to be around, Lavera is a perfect babysitter for the kids.
skills: She looks after the kids and always has an eye on every one of them.

name: Lyria
description: She is a very sweet and smart unicorn.
skills: She is very good at plants so its a big joy to go out with in the nature.

name: Balanda
description: She's a descendant of the Earth and Water Unicorn.
skills: She can hide so well in pink-colored flowering bushes and flowers, that thanks to her camouflage nobody recognizes her.
